Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>You have a lot of stuff, huh? Is there
anything else you want to get rid of?
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Oops. Your pouch is too full to hold any
of our delicious Hateno cheese.<sp:0:4:0>Come back later after you make some
room. I'll be waiting here with a fresh
batch for you.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks once again. Always happy to see
a satisfied customer.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Especially when it's...you know...you.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Com_Talk_05b:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Take your time. Not like I was doing
anything important.
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I see. And you're sure you don't want any
of our rich, delicious Hateno cheese?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm glad you came out here anyway.
It's worth making the cheese just for that.
Com_Talk_05c:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll find a use for whatever you want to
sell me, I promise.
Com_Talk_13: Yeah? How many do you want to sell?
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think>There's no nice way to say this—you don't
have enough rupees for that.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Even if it's late at night, I'm still glad you
came out here.
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Relax. I don't want you to feel stressed
out when going through your pouch.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? Won't the cheese get smushed if you
try to fit it into a pouch that full?<sp:0:4:0>Let's try this again sometime after you've
reorganized that thing.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm glad you came out here. You should
stick around a while to take shelter from
the rain.
Com_Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Oh, sorry, but that's one thing I won't
buy off of you.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This might sound out of the blue, but do
you want some <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>? I'd be
fine giving you some, if you want!<sp:0:4:0>And don't worry if you can't afford it.
I'll accept <clr:0000>fresh milk <clr:ffff>as<clr:0000> trade<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>For customers willing to trek directly
to the pasture, it's the least I can do!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>OK, you understand that I'm not going to
buy your clothes while you're still wearing
them, right? For obvious reasons?
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're here for Hateno cheese, pick out
whichever block you like from the ones
lined up there.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm glad you made the trek out. Since
you're here, you should treat yourself
to some <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>Don't worry about the price. If you don't
have any money, I'll <clr:0000>trade<clr:ffff> you the cheese
for some <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thanks to you, my great-grandpa's dream
of a uniquely Hateno cheese wasn't lost.<sp:0:4:0>I'm really and truly grateful for that.
Talk_03: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>Leaving already?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>That's OK. <sp:5:0:0>Just be sure to visit again...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Hmm... It's not much of a trade if you
don't have any <clr:0000>fresh milk <clr:ffff>on your end.
Com_Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks. Was there anything else you had
in mind to sell?
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Good choice! Presenting a chunk of
thiiick, rich, highly nutritious, and
absolutely unbeatable Hateno cheese!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You want to trade a bottle of <clr:0000>fresh milk<clr:ffff>
for one chunk of our <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>?
Com_Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'll buy anything off of you, so don't hold
back on my account.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for buying out my stock!<sp:0:4:0>I'm going to wear out my gratitude
muscles if I keep thanking you so much.<sp:0:4:0>Don't worry, I'll make more cheese!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>I mean...I basically just make it for you...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm only a one-woman cheese-making
operation, but stay as long as you like,
and buy to your heart's content!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Sorry, but I'm out of Hateno cheese
right now.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I also buy things, if you're in the market
to sell whatever you don't need.
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Sure, I'll find some use for this. Are you
still in a selling mood?
